#load preDDMT
``` {r}
readLines("E:/Myotis_vivesi/DDMT/Mviv17_49_ACC_Call.csv", 3)
PreDDMT <- read.csv("E:/Myotis_vivesi/DDMT/Mviv17_49_ACC_Call.csv")

str(PreDDMT)

names(PreDDMT)[2] <- "Event"
names(PreDDMT)
```

#load postDDMT
``` {r}
readLines("E:/Myotis_vivesi/DDMT/Mviv17_49_ACC_Call_outputDDMT.csv", 3)
PostDDMT <- read.csv("E:/Myotis_vivesi/DDMT/Mviv17_49_ACC_Call_outputDDMT.csv", sep = ";")

str(PostDDMT)

names(PostDDMT)[1] <- "Event"
names(PostDDMT)[6] <- "Time"
names(PostDDMT)
```

#merge pre and postDDMT
``` {r}
names(PreDDMT)
names(PostDDMT)
ALL_DDMT <- merge(PreDDMT, PostDDMT, by.x = "Event", by.y = "Event")
names(ALL_DDMT)
ALL_DDMT_clean <- ALL_DDMT[-c(2:12, 20, 21)]
names(ALL_DDMT_clean)
```

#save and check Metrics
``` {r}
getwd()
write.csv(ALL_DDMT_clean, file = "E:/Myotis_vivesi/DDMT/Mviv17_49_metrics.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
